channel.title: EuroScape Development - Turmoil - Soul Spit - 600+ Data - Project Insanity
channel.description:
Hey Mopar. I Dont Care What You Say About Project Insanity, I Like It. And Also I Dont Care If You Say "Ahh Not Another Project Insanity Loading 600+".
Back On Topic. Im Going To Be Updating This Every Time I Develop Something On EuroScape So You Guys Can Keep Up With The Development And Also Keep Up When This Is Going To Be Release As Version 1.0.
Server Side Features ( So Far Completed) : Nomad. Sea Snake. Corp Beast. Castle Wars. Bounty Hunter. Clan Wars. Leeches. Curses. Report Player. Pking & Skilling. Summoning. Dungeoneering. New Clan Chat. Awesome Yell System. Quest Tab. Acheivement Tab. Full Voting System. Anti-Null. Anti-Syi. Only 1 Login From Each IP Host. MySQL System. Firemaking Base Added. Fishing No Bugs What So Ever. Skilling All In One Zone. Tutorial Island, I May Delete As This Is No Longer A 2006 F2P Rs-Remake. Perfect Combat Added, Re-Wrote Old Project Insanity One. Turmoil, Added Correct GFX + ANIMATION And Deleted Old Project Insanity One. 2012 RuneScape Trading System, With Loaded Prices. Loads Of Minigames. Re-Wrote Tz-Tok-Jad, As Project Insanity Base Didnt Have. Added New Member / Donator Icon, Added In Private Chat / Yell System / Public Chat / Clan Chat. New RuneScape Fishing Spots, With Correct Places. Every NPC RuneScape Has Today, In Correct Places. All RuneScape Object, All Over The World. Dupes Get Detected Instantly And Automaticly Bans You. Cliped Following Players And NPCs. NPC Only Follow You A Certain Distance When Running Away From Combat. Perfect Dropping System, Adding New Drop System Soon. ( Same As Embattled Scapes One Hopefully ). Perfect Items, All Correct Hits And All Correct ANIMATIONS On Special Attack. New Dragon Claws Look, 4 Hit On Spec. Perfection Slayer, Automaticly Talks To Duradel When Completed Task, And You Dont Have To Go Back To Him To Get New Task He Automaticly Sets You One. All Teleports, Minigames, Skilling, Monsters, Home, Trade Area, Special Pking.
Client Side Features ( So Far Completed) : New Loading Bar. New Login Box. Dont Have To Click Login To Login You Can Press Enter. New RuneScape Chat Area And Tab Icons, Credit To "RuneScape Enhanced Owner" As I Ripped From His Client Along With Some Others. New Equiptment Stats. 660 Items. 525 Maps. 508 Objects. New Map Dump, And Item Dump. New Character Model, 633 I Think. New Item Models. New GFX + ANIMATIONS, 634 I Think. New GameFrame, 667/711 I Think.
Thanks For Viewing, Pictures And More Information Coming On Next Update.

@BentonScape wrote:

Hey Mopar.
I Dont Care What You Say About Project Insanity, I Like It. And Also I Dont Care If You Say “Ahh Not Another Project Insanity Loading 600+”.

Back On Topic.
Im Going To Be Updating This Every Time I Develop Something On EuroScape So You Guys Can Keep Up With The Development And Also Keep Up When This Is Going To Be Release As Version 1.0.

Server Side Features ( So Far Completed) :
Nomad.

Added New Member / Donator Icon, Added In Private Chat / Yell System / Public Chat / Clan Chat.

Perfect Dropping System, Adding New Drop System Soon. ( Same As Embattled Scapes One Hopefully ).

New Dragon Claws Look, 4 Hit On Spec.

All Teleports, Minigames, Skilling, Monsters, Home, Trade Area, Special Pking.

Client Side Features ( So Far Completed) :
New Loading Bar.
New Login Box.
Dont Have To Click Login To Login You Can Press Enter.
New RuneScape Chat Area And Tab Icons, Credit To “RuneScape Enhanced Owner” As I Ripped From His Client Along With Some Others.

660 Items.

New Map Dump, And Item Dump.

New GFX + ANIMATIONS, 634 I Think.
